abstract: Federation of Protestant Welfare Agencies, one of seven agencies supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, provides Gloria Paige of Queens with money to buy household items and clothes to aid her in her job search.
lead_paragraph: Gloria Paige overcame decades of drug abuse to confront mental illness, find clarity in writing and reconnect with her estranged sons.

headline.main: In the Wake of Addiction, a Life Bright With Purpose
headline.print_headline: Substance Abuse Gives Way to a Life Bright With Clarity and Salvaged Relationships

snippet: Gloria Paige overcame decades of drug abuse to confront mental illness, find clarity in writing and reconnect with her estranged sons.
